actions.text: Committee on Judiciary. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Thurmond. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Approved for reporting without amendment without recommendation.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without recommendation without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 697.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: An original resolution to waive section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act, with respect to consideration of S. 2216, designating September 17, 1987, the bicentennial of the signing of the Constitution of the United States, as "Constitution Day".

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of S. 2216 (Constitution Day).

titles.title: An original resolution to waive section 303(a) of the Congressional Budget Act, with respect to consideration of S. 2216, designating September 17, 1987, the bicentennial of the signing of the Constitution of the United States, as "Constitution Day".
